useQuery.title: Pattern: useQuery (Component-Level Loading)
useQuery.description: Data fetching is handled in the component using useQuery. The component manually manages loading, error, and success states. Good for optional data or when you need fine-grained control over loading UI.

loader.title: Pattern: Router Loader + useSuspenseQuery (Blocking)
loader.description: Data is pre-fetched in the route loader using queryClient.ensureQueryData(). The route blocks navigation until data loads. Component uses useSuspenseQuery for guaranteed data availability. Best for critical data that must be present before render.

deferred.title: Pattern: Deferred Loading with defer() + Await
deferred.description: The route loader returns immediately using defer(), allowing the page shell to render instantly. The Await component with Suspense streams in data when ready. Best for slow or non-critical data where fast navigation is prioritized.
